pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Cyral Gimme DB TokenThe Cyral Gimme DB Token is a tool used for easing the process of SSO login to databases through the command line.## DeprecatedThis tool is **deprecated** and no longer valid with Cyral Control Plane version `4.12` or later. Please use the [Cyral CLI](https://pypi.org/project/cyral/) to retrieve tokens going forward.
